name: WPMINBC15
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The WPMI NBC 15 Flash Briefing brings you Mobile area news and weather as well as top stories from around the world. Get the latest throughout the day, direct from our news staff.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
